channel.title: Oh Cra
channel.description: Hey, I accidently wore my Statius Platebody in combat now it's (DEG) how can I fix it so It will be sellable?

item.title: Oh Cra
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:8, topic:448516”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=551414.msg4040643#msg4040643 date=1341600473]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=551414.msg4040591#msg4040591 date=1341596596]

The hammer degraded before I even started pking
[/quote]Statius hammers don’t just vanish and go poof.

corrupt items degrade if you equipt them.
[/quote]Why did you equip it before fighting?[/quote]
I used to host dicing, I wanted to look like I had more money than I actually had and I wanted to look rich lul.

Read full topic

item.title: Oh Cra
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

A good method of gaining something back from the item before it vanishes is to have your character die in the wilderness when skulled. You will lose the item but gain approximately 1.5m coins in return if you return to where you died. This method is more lucrative then alching the item before it vanishes. This can be achieved by poisoning then allowing your character to die, or getting a trusted friend to kill you.

Read full topic

item.title: Oh Cra
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

rs wiki will say the alch price.
I bought a corrupt stat hammer and a corrupt vls once for pking back before I was 78 attack. I didn’t know they degraded just from equipping and I was wearing it for ages. The hammer degraded before I even started pking and the vls didn’t last long in the wildi :\ haha.

Read full topic
